description: Learn how to make this irresistible, no-cook raw peanut and date caramel slice, that's perfect for dessert and simply melts in your mouth.
name: Raw Peanut & Date Caramel Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make choc-peanut drizzle, place peanut butter and oil in a microwave- safe bowl and microwave, uncovered, on high for 30 seconds or until melted. Add cocoa and syrup, stirring until combined. Pour mixture over date 'caramel' and smooth top. Chill in fridge for 2 hours or until set. Serve.

To make choc-peanut drizzle, place peanut butter and oil in a microwave- safe bowl and microwave, uncovered, on high for 30 seconds or until melted. Add cocoa and syrup, stirring until combined. Pour mixture over date 'caramel' and smooth top. Chill in fridge for 2 hours or until set. Serve.
